title: Does anybody know about the type on Wrigley's gum wrappers?
content:
The old ones, of course. Any suggestions welcome. Thanks! Pictures are attached.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [1621.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131024003239/http:/typophile.com/files/1621.jpg) | 32.45 KB |
| [1622.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131024003239/http:/typophile.com/files/1622.jpg) | 32.28 KB |
| [1624.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131024003239/http:/typophile.com/files/1624.jpg) | 27.18 KB |
author: hungrymoon

comments.content:
I'm afraid I don't know the font, but looking at these images really made me nostalgic for times when labels weren't filled with gradients and ridiculous drop shadows and things.

I used to love the old pepsi branding from the early 90's
Anyone have any idea what font this is?
Do you have a sample? The old attachments seem to have disappeared.
